resp = client.search(
    index="shirts",
    query={
        "bool": {
            "filter": {
                "term": {
                    "brand": "gucci"
                }
            }
        }
    },
    aggs={
        "colors": {
            "terms": {
                "field": "color"
            }
        },
        "color_red": {
            "filter": {
                "term": {
                    "color": "red"
                }
            },
            "aggs": {
                "models": {
                    "terms": {
                        "field": "model"
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    },
    post_filter={
        "term": {
            "color": "red"
        }
    },
)
print(resp)
